// src/components/iceland-trip/liveInfo.js import React from 'react'; import { Info, MapPin, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { liveInfoData } from './itineraryData'; const LiveInfo = ({ theme }) => { return (

冰島即時資訊

{/* 北極光預報 */}

北極光預報

{liveInfoData.northernLights.forecast}
今晚活動指數
最佳觀賞時間 {liveInfoData.northernLights.bestTime}
雲層狀況 {liveInfoData.northernLights.visibility}
最後更新 {liveInfoData.northernLights.lastUpdated}
推薦觀賞地點
    {liveInfoData.northernLights.bestLocations.map((location, idx) => (
  • {location}
    • ))}
{/* 道路狀況 */}

道路狀況

{liveInfoData.roadConditions.map((road, idx) => ( ))}
道路名稱 狀態 路況 更新時間
{road.road} {road.status} {road.conditions} {road.lastUpdated}

資料來源: Icelandic Road and Coastal Administration (Vegagerðin)

查看詳細路況資訊 →
{/* 當地新聞 */}

冰島最新消息

{liveInfoData.localNews.map((news, idx) => (

{news.title}

{news.time}
))}
); }; export default LiveInfo;
